name: Solar System Assembly
description:
Solar System Assembly

Extraterrestrials have tasked you with assembling a new solar system for them to occupy. Place planets and celestial bodies carefully to appeal to their tastes and score points. Be careful though the temperature of the sun plays a role in where some planets can be placed.

{Esc} to start

{H} for help

{C} for credits

{M} to mute/unmute audio

How to play:

Place planets, moons, and other objects to gain points. More objects are awarded as you reach the score goal. It is game over if you run out of objects to place. You can move onto another solar system whenever you want by clicking the "Next Star" button.

Objects

Planets

Desert (tan): Bonus points near water planets.

Ice (white): Maximum points far away from the sun. Loses points for each nearby volcanic planet.

Plant(green): Maximum points in the habitable zone. Bonus points near water planets.

Rock (brown): Maximum points anywhere.

Volcanic (red): Maximum points when near the sun. Negative points for each nearby ice planet.

Water (blue): Maximum points in habitable zone. Negative points elsewhere

Moons

2 points. +2 points if the moon type matches the planet. +1 point for each unique moon if all moons are unique.
